languages.text: "Клянусь, все было не..." {n}Женщина в рваном спецкостюме подается вперед, но тут же хватается за горло, на котором проступает алая полоса. Вы замечаете тонкие нити, затянутые на шеях пленных.{/n}

"I swear, we are not sabo—" {n}A woman in a tattered protective suit pushes forward in protest, but her movement is halted by the thin cord wrapped around her neck. You notice that all the captives have been similarly restrained. The woman clutches her throat as a thin line of scarlet appears between her fingers.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Клянусь, все было не..." {n}Женщина в рваном спецкостюме подается вперед, но тут же хватается за горло, на котором проступает алая полоса. Вы замечаете тонкие нити, затянутые на шеях пленных.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "I swear it wasn't like th—" {n}A woman in a torn protective suit dashes forward, only to clasp at her throat, on which a scarlet strip appears. You notice thin strings tied around the captives' necks.{/n}

"I swear it wasn't like th—" {n}A woman in a torn protective suit dashes forward, only to clasp at her throat, on which a scarlet strip appears. You notice thin strings tied around the captives' necks.{/n}

You notice that all the captives have been similarly restrained. The woman clutches her throat as a thin line of scarlet appears between her fingers.{/n}

You notice that all the captives have been similarly restrained. The woman clutches her throat as a thin line of scarlet appears between her fingers.{/n}

"I swear, we are not sabo—" {n}A woman in a tattered protective suit pushes forward in protest, but her movement is halted by the thin cord wrapped around her neck. You notice that all the captives have been similarly restrained. The woman clutches her throat as a thin line of scarlet appears between her fingers.{/n}

languages.text: « Je jure que nous ne sommes pas des sabo... » {n}proteste une femme vêtue d'une combinaison de protection en lambeaux tout en s'avançant avant d'être brusquement retenue par la fine corde enroulée autour de son cou. Vous remarquez que tous les prisonniers ont été entravés de la même manière. La femme porte les mains à son cou, et de fines lignes écarlates ruissellent le long de ses doigts.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I swear, we are not sabo—" {n}A woman in a tattered protective suit pushes forward in protest, but her movement is halted by the thin cord wrapped around her neck. You notice that all the captives have been similarly restrained. The woman clutches her throat as a thin line of scarlet appears between her fingers.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Je jure que nous ne sommes pas des sabo... » {n}proteste une femme vêtue d'une combinaison de protection en lambeaux tout en s'avançant avant d'être brusquement retenue par la fine corde enroulée autour de son cou. Vous remarquez que tous les prisonniers ont été entravés de la même manière. La femme porte les mains à son cou, et de fines lignes écarlates ruissellent le long de ses doigts.{/n}

languages.text: «Juro que no íbamos a sabo...». {n}Una mujer con un traje protector desgarrado se adelante en protesta, pero el delgado hilo atado a su cuello la detiene. Reparas en que todos los prisioneros están inmovilizados del mismo modo. La mujer se aferra la garganta y una fina línea escarlata aparece entre sus dedos.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I swear, we are not sabo—" {n}A woman in a tattered protective suit pushes forward in protest, but her movement is halted by the thin cord wrapped around her neck. You notice that all the captives have been similarly restrained. The woman clutches her throat as a thin line of scarlet appears between her fingers.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Juro que no íbamos a sabo...». {n}Una mujer con un traje protector desgarrado se adelante en protesta, pero el delgado hilo atado a su cuello la detiene. Reparas en que todos los prisioneros están inmovilizados del mismo modo. La mujer se aferra la garganta y una fina línea escarlata aparece entre sus dedos.{/n}

languages.text: “我发誓，我们绝对没打算搞破——”{n}一个穿着破旧防护服的女人向前走来，表示抗议，但脖子上的细线猛然缠紧，让她停了下来。你注意到，所有俘虏都被类似的手段束缚住了。女人紧紧地抓着自己的喉咙，猩红色的细线浮现在她的手指之间。{/n}
languages.original_text: "I swear, we are not sabo—" {n}A woman in a tattered protective suit pushes forward in protest, but her movement is halted by the thin cord wrapped around her neck. You notice that all the captives have been similarly restrained. The woman clutches her throat as a thin line of scarlet appears between her fingers.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “我发誓，我们绝对没打算搞破——”{n}一个穿着破旧防护服的女人向前走来，表示抗议，但脖子上的细线猛然缠紧，让她停了下来。你注意到，所有俘虏都被类似的手段束缚住了。女人紧紧地抓着自己的喉咙，猩红色的细线浮现在她的手指之间。{/n}

languages.text: 「誓います。私達は決して…」{n}ボロボロの防護服を着た女性が抗議のために前へ出たが、首に巻かれた細い紐で動きを止められた。捕虜全員が同じように拘束されていることに、あなたは気が付いた。指の間に緋色の細い線が浮かび、女性は喉を押さえている。{/n}
languages.original_text: "I swear, we are not sabo—" {n}A woman in a tattered protective suit pushes forward in protest, but her movement is halted by the thin cord wrapped around her neck. You notice that all the captives have been similarly restrained. The woman clutches her throat as a thin line of scarlet appears between her fingers.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「誓います。私達は決して…」{n}ボロボロの防護服を着た女性が抗議のために前へ出たが、首に巻かれた細い紐で動きを止められた。捕虜全員が同じように拘束されていることに、あなたは気が付いた。指の間に緋色の細い線が浮かび、女性は喉を押さえている。{/n}

languages.text: "Ich schwöre, wir sind keine Sabot-" {n}Eine Frau in einem zerschlissenen Schutzanzug drängt vor, um zu protestieren, doch ihre Bewegung wird abrupt durch den dünnen Draht gestoppt, der um ihren Hals gewickelt ist. Du bemerkst, dass alle Gefangenen auf ähnliche Weise gefesselt sind. Die Frau greift sich an den Hals. Ein dünner roter Stricht erscheint zwischen ihren Fingern.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I swear, we are not sabo—" {n}A woman in a tattered protective suit pushes forward in protest, but her movement is halted by the thin cord wrapped around her neck. You notice that all the captives have been similarly restrained. The woman clutches her throat as a thin line of scarlet appears between her fingers.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Ich schwöre, wir sind keine Sabot-" {n}Eine Frau in einem zerschlissenen Schutzanzug drängt vor, um zu protestieren, doch ihre Bewegung wird abrupt durch den dünnen Draht gestoppt, der um ihren Hals gewickelt ist. Du bemerkst, dass alle Gefangenen auf ähnliche Weise gefesselt sind. Die Frau greift sich an den Hals. Ein dünner roter Stricht erscheint zwischen ihren Fingern.{/n}

languages.text: "Yemin ederim ki sabotaj yapmıy..." {n}Paramparça olmuş koruyucu bir giysi içindeki kadın, itiraz edercesine öne çıkıyor. Ancak boynunu saran ince kablo, hareketlerine mâni oluyor. Tüm tutsakların aynı şekilde kontrol altına alındığını fark ediyorsun. Kadın, tırnaklarını boğazına geçiriyor. Parmaklarının arasında incecik, kızıl bir çizgi beliriyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I swear, we are not sabo—" {n}A woman in a tattered protective suit pushes forward in protest, but her movement is halted by the thin cord wrapped around her neck. You notice that all the captives have been similarly restrained. The woman clutches her throat as a thin line of scarlet appears between her fingers.{/n}
